books.title: A World Without Email
books.author: Cal Newport
books.comments: A truly insightful commentary on the inefficient workflows we default to in knowledge work, along with some thoughts on a solution. The term "hyperactive hive mind" is now forever in my vocabulary.

books.title: Going Postal
books.author: Terry Pratchett
books.comments: Delightfully funny and unexpected. This was my first Pratchett book. It very likely won't be my last.
